english: It's not my Mr. Gündo that's the problem with that bitch called Goncagül.

text: Onların hepsinin tek bir isteği vardır
Önce Dodurga, sonra Kayı otağına kurulmak isterler
english: First they want to dodurga, then they want to be set up in the pot.

text: Ona bir şey olursa ne ederim ben?
english: What would I do if something happened to her?

text: Gündoğdu Bey'im Selcan'ı sağ salim getirecek obaya
english: Mr. Gündüz will bring Selcan back safely to Obaya

text: Gönlünü ferah tut Sen yanlış bir şey yapmadın
english: Keep your heart at ease You didn't do anything wrong

text: Yaptığına yanlış diyorsan da telafisi yok değildir
english: If you think what you're doing is wrong, then there's no redemption.
Get in the tent, find the necklace.

text: Bulduğun vakit göreceksin. Bütün musibetler bir bir son bulacak
english: When you find it, you'll see, all the plagues will come to an end.

text: Yolumuzun ilk günü epey bereketli geçti Alpler
english: The first day of our journey was a blessing, the Alps.

text: Şu bozkırda her taşın altından biz çıkarız beyim
english: We'll come out from under every stone on that steppe, sir.

text: Dur bakalım, hangi taşın altında kalacağız?
english: Wait, what rock are we gonna be under?

text: Ee taşlar da sağlam dursun kardeş
english: Well, keep the stones intact, brother.

text: Beyim, bu heybenin içine taş mı koydun ya?
english: Sir, did you put a rock in this saddlebag?
She's lost her mind in love.

text: Gayrı kuvveti de feri de gitti bizim oğlanın
english: The forces are gone and the ferri is gone.

text: Demek Kirmani Efendi'nin tedarikli olun dediği buymuş
english: So that's what Master Kirmani said about being supplied.
If they come into our tent and get what they want
We owe it to ourselves to find out who did this.
Ana, if the people hear about this,

text: Bu mesele ahalinin kulağına çalınmadan şüphelendiklerimizin üzerinden gitmeliyiz
english: We need to go over what we suspect of not being heard by the public.

text: Sen ne dersin kızım? Bildiğin bir şey mi vardır?
otağımıza çok rahat girip çıkan biridir ana
english: He's a very comfortable man who comes in and out of our tent, Mother.
I'd say Gökçe is the mother.
I know, he grew up in your hands

text: Lakin Gökçe bu otağda konuşulanları başka yerlere taşır
english: But Gökçe takes what's said in this tent elsewhere

text: Ertuğrul Bey'imin başına gelenlerin sorumlusu odur, sen de bilirsin
english: He's responsible for what happened to Mr. Ertugrul, and you know it.

text: Üstelik tek başına da değil ana
Gökçe, Goncagül ve Aytolun'un oyunlarına alet olduğunun farkında değil ana
english: Gökçe doesn't realize that Goncagül and Aytolun are a tool for his games.

text: sen neler bilirsin de bana demezsin ha? De hele!
english: What do you know about me?

text: Ana, Goncagül, Gündoğdu Bey'imin hatunu olacak. Saygım sonsuz
english: Ana, Goncagül will be Mr. Gündü's girl.

text: Lakin gördüklerim ve duyduklarım susmama mani olur
english: But what I see and hear won't stop me from talking.
The night we dined together in the tent.

text: Goncagül ve Gökçe'yi Sungur Tekin Bey'imin otağına girerken gördüm
english: I saw Goncagül and Gökçe enter Sungur Tekin Bey's tent

text: Yaptıklarını Gündoğdu Bey'im yanına kor mu sandın ha?
english: What do you think you're doing, Mr. Gündüz?

text: Gündoğdu bir gün daha görür mü sanmıştın?
english: Did you think he'd see another sunrise?

text: Belli ki Ertuğrul Bey'imin yaptıkları pek bir zoruna gitmiş
english: It's obvious what Mr. Ertugrul's doing has gone to a lot of trouble.

text: Hainlerden medet umar hale geldiğine göre ne yaptığını bilemez olmuşsun
english: You don't know what you're doing now that you've turned your back on traitors.

text: Lakin Gündoğdu'm gelecek Aha bu ıssız yerlerde
english: But my sunup will come in these lonely places

text: senin o pis leşini aç hayvanlara yem edecek
english: He's going to feed your filthy carcass to hungry animals.
First dawn, then Ertugrul will die.
But first of all, you're going to die.
Listen to me, everyone sneak up on me.

text: Benden emir gelene dek kimse hareket etmesin. Anlaşıldı mı?
english: No one moves until I give the order.
You'll see when he gets here.
Sunup while my brother Selcan rescues Hatun
We need to keep busy, too.
We have to find the seal.
Since you didn't take the ephrasiab
the seal is on the obada.

text: Lakin obada mührün sırrını başka kim bilir ki?
english: But who else knows the secret to the seal?

text: Obayı sen benden daha iyi bilirsin Artuk Bey
english: You know the Oba better than I do, Mr. Artuk.

text: Lakin mührü çalan kişi Moğolların adamı değildir
english: But he who steals the seal is not a man of the Mongols

text: Mührün sırrını Sultan Alaeddin'in yakın çevresinden başka kimse bilmez
english: No one knows the seal's secret but the inner circle of Sultan Alaeddin.
You protect our children from the plagues of our obas.
Don't take your hand away from us, Lord.
No one can protect us but you
It's not just in our room anymore, brother.
We don't know who to trust.
Let's not be shaken by a new betrayal
What makes you say that, Hayme?
We've wiped out the traitors from our other branch.

text: Ertuğrul, Kocabaş'ın kellesini aldığında ben de senin gibi düşünmüştüm
english: When Ertugrul took Big Head's head, I thought the same thing as you.
But I was wrong, the traitors are still in our cabin.
It belongs to Sungur Tekin in my tent.

text: Noyan'ın istediği çok kıymetli bir şey çalınmıştır abi
Kim yapar bunu? Bu nasıl olur?

english: ♪ In our Obama, inside us, in our tent ♪
There are traitors who betray us

text: Gel bakalım obanın akıllı oğlanı. Gel hele
yuvan yıkıldıktan sonra hangi ine girdin?
english: What den did you enter after your nest collapsed?

text: Dağ taş benim inimdir akıllı oğlan
english: The mountain is my den, wise boy.
I hear you've got a second degree.

text: O yüzden gelmezsin derdim ama esaslı ermişsin
english: That's why I'd say you wouldn't come, but you're really good.
You didn't forget your first day.
Let me see the seal first.
